00019     mCurrentName = _T("");
00020     mUpdateName = _T("");

00022     mParent = NULL;

00063 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00068 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00069 void ClientListItem::readFromStream
00070     (
00071     std::istream &aStream
00072     )
00073 {
00074     char utf8Name[200];
00075     TCHAR tcharName[200];
00076     int idx = 0;
00077     char temp;
00078 
00079     memset( utf8Name, 0, sizeof( utf8Name ) );
00080 
00081     aStream >> mId;
00082     aStream.get();    // consume '-' inserted between id and name
00083 
00084     while( aStream.peek() != '\n' && !aStream.eof() )
00085     {
00086         aStream.read( &temp, 1 );
00087         utf8Name[idx++] = temp;
00088     }
00089     aStream.get();    // consume '\n' inserted after name
00090     MultiByteToWideChar( CP_UTF8, 0, utf8Name, -1, tcharName, 200 );
00091     mCurrentName.SetString( tcharName );
00092     mUpdateName.SetString( _T("") );
00093     mIsValid = TRUE;
00094 }
00095

00149 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00153 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00154 void ClientListItem::writeToStream
00155     (
00156     std::ofstream &aStream
00157     ) const
00158 {
00159     int nameLength = WideCharToMultiByte( CP_UTF8, 0, mCurrentName, -1, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL );
00160     char* name = new char[nameLength];
00161 
00162     WideCharToMultiByte( CP_UTF8, 0, mCurrentName, -1, name, nameLength, NULL, NULL );
00163     aStream << mId << "-" << name << '\n';
00164 
00165     delete [] name;
00166 }

00168 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00171 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00172 void ClientListItem::save()
00173 {
00174     if( mParent )
00175     {
00176         mParent->save();
00177     }
00178 }
